author: rhuijben
msg: Bring the locate_copyfrom() handler in our update_editor into the WC-NG
world.  Document it's current behavior which before this patch relied
on svn_wc_entry_t perticularities. This enables future extenstion later.
Also allow using known to be good pristine data without reusing its
in-wc data, to avoid some cases where we contacted the repository, but
really had all the data we need.
It is probably easier to review locate_copyfrom() as a new function, then
trying to extract the old behavior from the patch.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(locate_copyfrom): Rewritten to return streams and hash tables with
contents and properties. Document old-assumptions as they apply
to the wc-ng world.
(add_file_with_history): Update caller. Take scratch pool.
(add_file): Update caller. Use subpool as scratch_pool for
add_file_with_history.
